title: kaama dhEnuka
sahitya:
kAmadhEnukA divya nAmAmruta pAnan aruLum



anupallavi



sAma vEda sAramAna tatvamasi mantirattil Urum sOma sUrya

rasattait-tandu shOka mOha dAgam pongum 



caraNam



punitamAna pullil mEindu pUnguzhalum yAzhundOindu

manidar dEvarAga jnAna maDi shurakkumpaDi aruL sey
